testimonials.text: After my delivery, I let time pass without really taking care of myself. Rehabilitation six months later, no physical activity... In short, I had forgotten myself in my life as a mom. Then I tried a class with Diane.

testimonials.text: Diane is a very pedagogical and inspiring fitness coach üëç She perfectly adapts her coaching to her clients' profiles. A fine psychologist, she challenges, stimulates, encourages, and congratulates with accuracy.
